name: Hendrix Edwards
description: I’m an honest,amiable,brave,fun loving and down to earth man seeking for a woman that’s like minded to build a strong relationship and travel round the world with her and I’m ready to give her my all and expect her to be understandable though. I love spending my time on seaside and I dream of having my own beach also I love football,skiing and athletics. I’d love to go places like Colombo,Jerusalem,Casablanca,Fez and other mind captivating places
